ComicInfo.Title: Winterlong
ComicInfo.Summary:
Mary and Professor Troughton meet up with Andrew’s oldest friend, Deborah Dancer, to learn more about his past — and to hatch a plan that might save Andrew from his curse!
Trouble is, they’re going to have to track down the deadliest vampire alive to do it...
What is Andrew planning for the future of the vampire race?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-20 01:13:32. [CVDB370459] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 00:48:07. [Issue ID 1036009]
ComicInfo.Characters: John Troughton,Mishkin (a dog),Manny,Mary, Queen of Blood [Mary Seward],Deborah Dancer,Tig Rafelson,Charles Francis Thompson (first appearance),Sven,Andrew Bennett
